acid.description: Mortal Wounds - Acidic - Electrical - Fire - Luminous
acid.name: Acidic - Electrical - Fire - Luminous

results.condition_recovery: You were instantly killed.

effects.1: You were cremated alive and all that remains of who you once were are the ashes of our flesh and bone.
effects.2: Flesh, fat, and muscle have burned away to reveal scorched and crumbling bone.
effects.3: Your flesh is too blackened to even be edible by the crows.
effects.4: Your friends might find the smell of your cooked body pleasant if they weren’t your friends.
effects.5: The scarred ruin of your flesh betrays your fiery end.
effects.6: Ghastly burns reveal your harsh demise.

results.condition_recovery: You were instantly killed

effects.1: Flesh, fat, and muscle have burned away to reveal scorched and crumbling bone.
effects.2: Your flesh is too blackened by fire to even be edible by the crows.
effects.3: Your friends might find the smell of your cooked body pleasant if they weren’t your friends.
effects.4: The scarred ruin of your flesh betrays your fiery end.
effects.5: Ghastly burns reveal your harsh demise.
effects.6: Your corpse is largely intact and ready for a noble funeral.

results.condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: All your limbs are burned off, your lungs are scorched, and your face hideously scarred (as per both arms burned off both, both legs burned off, lungs blackened, gruesome scarring)
effects.2: Your eyes, ears, nose, and lips sloughed off under the terrible heat (as per both eyes lost, both ears lost, lips and tongue lost, and gruesome scarring)
effects.3: Both legs are burned off (DEX reduced to 3 for AC purposes, two crutches required, movement reduced by 60’, cannot force march).
effects.4: Both arms are burned off (cannot climb, use weapons or items, open locks, remove traps, or similar actions).
effects.5: Both your eyes were melted in the heat (blinded, -4 attack throws, no LOS, movement reduced to ¼ normal, -2 to surprise rolls)
effects.6: Your fiery screams just left your lips and tongues to be burned away (mute, cannot speak, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, and -4 to reaction rolls).

results.condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: One leg and one arm were burned off; the other half was merely reduced to pink scar tissue (as per one leg lost, one arm lost, notable scarring)
effects.2: Both of your ears and most of your face were burned away (-2 to Listening throws, -2 to surprise rolls, gruesome scarring)
effects.3: One leg is burned off (crutch is required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes).
effects.4: One arm is burned off (cannot climb, use shields, dual wield, or use two-handed weapon).
effects.5: One of your eyes melted in the heat (-2 to missile attack throws).
effects.6: Your lips and jaw were burned white (notable scarring)

results.condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your struggle to draw breath through scorched and blackened lungs (must rest for 2 turns every 6, wilder-ness movement reduced by 1/3, cannot force march, CON reduced by 1/3)
effects.2: The flame burns away your genitals and leaves just blackened lumps (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known).
effects.3: One foot is burned off (peg required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.4: One hand is burned off (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons).
effects.5: The flesh of one of your cheeks is pink and lump with a large burn scar (notable scarring).
effects.6: Your fingernails are blackened from the burning (minor scarring).

results.condition_recovery: You are in shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of rest.

effects.1: Your face melts like wax and chars like beef in the flame (gruesome scarring).
effects.2: Your ear is burned off (-1 to Listening throws and -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.3: 1d3 toes on one foot are burned off (3 lost toes on one foot makes foot useless).
effects.4: 1d3 fingers on one hand are burned off (3 lost fingers on one hand makes hand useless.)
effects.5: The smallest finger on one hand is burned off (3 lost fingers on a hand makes it useless).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

results.condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bed rest.

effects.1: The pain of the burns never goes away – never (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: Your hair burned away, and half your torso and one arm are pink and lumpy with burn scars (two notable scarrings).
effects.3: Your hair caught fire and burned away, leaving your scalp blackened and hairline patchy (notable scarring).
effects.4: Your hand has a white and ragged scar where it burned (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

results.condition_recovery: You were just dazed. You recover immediately with 1hp. You do not need any bed rest.

effects.1: Your scarred skin aches in bad weather (-1 to initiative in Frigid, Drizzly, or Rainy weather).
effects.2: Half your torso and one arm are pink and lumpy with burn scars (notable scarring).
effects.3: Your shoulder has a white and ragged scar where the flames burned hot (minor scarring).
effects.4: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.5: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.
effects.6: The Choosers of the Slain pass you by, and you awaken.

results.condition_recovery: You were instantly killed.

effects.1: No one would believe a human body could be crushed into a puddle.
effects.2: Your dead flesh hangs like a wet red blanket over your shattered skeleton.
effects.3: Your skull is crushed like an eggshell, cerebral fluid leaking out like yolk.
effects.4: Your rib cage’s collapse leads to an agonizing death gasping for air from ruptured lungs.
effects.5: Crushed bones and splattered brains betray your grisly end.
effects.6: A bone-shattering wound reveals your harsh demise.

results.condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: The bone-crushing impact drives you into a coma; you are alive but permanently unconscious and will starve unless force-fed.
effects.2: Your spine is broken at the neck (paralyzed, cannot move, fight, use items, or cast spells, Death save each month or die from complications).
effects.3: Both your legs are crushed and must be amputated (DEX reduced to 3 for AC purposes, two crutches required, movement reduced by 60’, cannot force march).
effects.4: Both your arms are crushed and must be amputated (cannot climb, use weapons or items, open locks, remove traps, or similar actions)
effects.5: You are permanently addled by a blow to the head (-2 on magical research and proficiency throws, -10% penalty on earned XP).
effects.6: Your jaw is irreparably broken, and all your teeth pulverized (cannot speak clearly, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, -4 to reaction rolls)

results.condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: Your spine is shattered at the waist (as per legs crushed, cannot reproduce, and must make Death save each year or die from complications).
effects.2: Both your legs are lamed by bad breaks (crutch required, movement reduced by 60’, DEX reduced by 2/3 for AC purposes).
effects.3: One of your legs is crushed and must be amputated (crutch is required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes).
effects.4: One of your arms is crushed and must be amputated (cannot climb, use shields, dual wield, or use two-handed weapon)
effects.5: A skull-shaking blow leaves you partly deaf and suffering ear-ringing head-aches (-2 to Listening throws, -2 to surprise rolls, -1 initiative).
effects.6: 3d6 teeth are broken inward by a forceful blow, leaving you slurring and gap-toothed (-4 to all reaction rolls, -1 to initiative when  spellcasting)

results.condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your shattered ribs press on your lungs, causing constant fatigue and pain (must rest for 2 turns every 6, wilderness movement reduced by 1/3, cannot force march, CON reduced by 1/3)
effects.2: One of your legs is lamed by a bad break (movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.3: One of your knees is damaged (normal load reduced by 6 stone, cannot force march).
effects.4: One of your hands is crushed and must be amputated (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons)
effects.5: One of your ear drums is popped, partially deafening you (-1 to Listening throws, -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.6: 1d6 of your teeth are knocked out (-2 to reaction rolls with opposite sex and upper-class NPCs).

results.condition_recovery: You are in shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your nose is flattened, cheek crushed, and ear turned to cauliflower (gruesome scarring)
effects.2: Scrotum crushed or womb ruptured (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known)
effects.3: Your hips are fractured and the break heals poorly (cannot force march).
effects.4: 1d3 fingers one hand are smashed into bloody pulp. (3 lost fingers on one hand makes hand useless.)
effects.5: Your ear is turned to cauliflower (minor scarring).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

results.condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bed rest.

effects.1: A broken rib heals badly and it aches when you move too fast (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: 1d3 toes on one foot smashed into bloody pulp. (3 lost toes on one foot makes leg lame).
effects.3: The wrenching blow leaves you with lower back pain (normal load reduced by 3 stone).
effects.4: 1d3 nails on a hand are blackened & ruinous (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

results.condition_recovery: You were instantly killed.

effects.1: You were frozen solid, and all that remains of who you once were is a statue of ice in your likeness
effects.2: Flesh, fat, and muscle have hardened to ice, encasing your bones in a frozen shell.
effects.3: Your flesh is frozen too solid for even the crows to peck at.
effects.4: Your friends might mistake your frozen form for a statue.
effects.5: The frostbitten pallor of your skin tells of your chilling end.
effects.6: Frozen to the core, your icy fate is evident.

results.condition_recovery: The powers of the spell restore you but at great cost. You need a month of bed rest.

effects.1: Your spirit returns, but not your body. You appear as a blue glowing figure equipped as in life. You can see, hear, & speak normally and can cast spells, but cannot otherwise interact with the world. You can only be harmed by spells, magic weapons, or incorporeal creatures. Your touch deals 1d10 to Chaotic creatures. Use CHA in lieu of STR; add fighter damage bonus.
effects.2: You sprout a pair of angel wings from your shoulder blades, but your bones become brittle and hollow. Your CON is halved, and you take double damage from bludgeoning and seismic. Your weight is reduced by 30%. You gain a 30’ Flight speed.
effects.3: You instantly age halfway to your racial maximum age. If already over halfway, you age to 1 year from racial maximum age
effects.4: Your physical form becomes exceptionally delicate, but very beautiful. You gain 4 points of CHA (maximum 18) but lose 4 points of STR (minimum 3). You are a subject of objectification and jealousy by those attracted to your sex but tend to be scorned as useless by those not attracted to your sex.
effects.5: Tampering with mortality takes a toll. You permanently lose 1 point of Constitution.
effects.6: You carry permanent bear markings of your faith (stigmata etc.). You suffer a -4 to reaction rolls with all those who do not worship your pantheon, but +2 to reaction rolls with those who share your faith.

results.condition_recovery: Your life and limb are restored, but with weird, lingering effects. You need 3 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: Your soul is marked and all extraplanar beings wish you dead, targeting you over allies. Every week, there is a 1 in 6 chance an 8 HD cacodemon will be sent to destroy you.
effects.2: You have been permanently connected to the spiritual plane and glow like a candle to the unliving. All undead can sense your presence within 60’.
effects.3: You did not return altogether human. You begin to resemble whatever animal best represents you (Judge’s discretion). You suffer -4 to reaction rolls with normal humans.
effects.4: Tampering with mortality has a deleterious effect on your mind. You permanently lose 1 point of Wisdom.
effects.5: Your hair is restored to its youthful vigor… over and over. You must shave twice a day or witness an inch of growth by sunset. Untrimmed hair growth hinders performance in combat, giving you a -1 to attack throwss.
effects.6: Domestic animals, fuzzy herbivores, and songbirds are delighted by you. They bark in greeting, hop over to meet you, and sing excitedly. Gain a +4 bonus to reaction rolls with them but suffer a -4 penalty to hide and sneak when any are within 30’.

results.condition_recovery: The restoration of life and limb was intense, and you remember little of the ordeal. You need 2 weeks of bed rest.
